items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor return
items.body: The dress has poor quality. Nothing looks like the pictures. I don't like the dress and wanted to return it. The return process is slow. The seller tried to make me keep a product, but I already bought another dress and really don't like this one. I chose to return; they finally created a label and sent it to me. I returned a package, but never received a refund. Very disappointed. Read more
items.author: Nicharee Kasamwat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it! Gorgeous
items.body: Wore this for my backyard wedding! Had to take the train off and hem, also I made the straps more supportive. But for the price.. DAMN ITS GOOD! I ordered a 6 - I am 5â€™1 approx 125lbs and breastfeeding :) Read more
items.author: Customer BT

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cheaply made
items.body: It was cheaply made on the top part. The inside was a very scratchy uncomfortable material. Was able to alter to make it perfext Read more
items.author: Kristina

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beware of sizing and very difficult to return!!
items.body: This dress runs very, very small. Please go by the measurements and not your typical dress size. Also be aware that this dress isnâ€™t easy to return like most Amazon items. This seller makes the decision whether or not they want to refund your money, even though the listing says â€œFree 30 day refundâ€. They also donâ€™t refund the shipping. They consider damage to the shipping bags a reason not to issue a refund so DONâ€™T RIP THE BAGS if you think you may need to do a return. Luckily I returned the dress unworn and in perfect condition so I was refunded eventually after lots of back and forth with the seller. Read more
items.author: Mimi The Great

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs small, size up.
items.body: This dress is so beautiful, however it does run small. I would certainly buy another one in a larger size. Great material and very flattering. Read more
items.author: Kelsey Munoz

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars No es fÃ¡cil de arreglar o coger para la cintura y busto por los apliques
items.body: Es mejor calidad que la que se observa en la foto, sin embargo la talla corre grande para mi. Lastimosamente no lo pude usar ni arreglar ni cambiar por el corto tiempo que tuve para mi evento. Pero tuve una facilidad soluciÃ³n a la hora de poderlo devolver. Read more
items.author: Katheryne M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Itâ€™s a beautiful dress, I must say it runs smaller. I ordered a different dress size 2 and it was bigger, this one I got size 2 and fits like a glove. Iâ€™m 5â€™4â€ and about 115 and it was perfect! Itâ€™s light, and looks elegant especially around the shoulders.10/10 recommend. Read more
items.author: Anonymous

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: G-ivory, G-white, L-white, I-ivory, L-ivory, I-white, D-white, D-ivory, C-ivory, C-white, K-ivory, K-white, F-white, F-ivory. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
